statements: SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, event_type, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, description, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_type, description FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, event_type, description FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND user_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM audit_logs GROUP BY event_type;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE description ILIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_id;
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id FROM audit_logs;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'login'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM audit_log GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM regulatory_contract WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, action FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND action LIKE 'Login%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_actions FROM audit_log GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_contract WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND regulator_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY contract_name;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM audit_log;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action_taken, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id > 100;
SELECT event_description FROM regulatory_events WHERE event_id < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_name, regulatory_status FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM audit_logs JOIN regulatory_events ON audit_logs.timestamp = regulatory_events.timestamp;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT event_description FROM regulatory_events WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, regulatory_status FROM smart_contracts WHERE regulatory_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM regulatory_events WHERE event_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM user WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contract WHERE contract_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_name FROM regulation WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE action_performed LIKE '%login%' AND date_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY date_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, description FROM regulation ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT user.user_id, user.name, audit_log.action_performed, audit_log.date_time FROM user JOIN audit_log ON user.user_id = audit_log.user_id;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contract WHERE contract_name ILIKE 'contract%' ORDER BY contract_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT contract_name, created_on FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM regulations WHERE name LIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT log_id, regulation_id, approved FROM compliance WHERE approved = true;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT a.log_id, a.action, u.username FROM audit_logs a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT r.name, c.approved FROM regulations r JOIN compliance c ON r.regulation_id = c.regulation_id WHERE c.approval = true;
SELECT s.contract_name, u.username, s.created_on FROM smart_contracts s JOIN users u ON s.created_by = u.user_id;
